name: yatindia-backend
description: Backend API for YAT India website forms

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist && find . -name '*.js' -not -path './node_modules/*' -not -path './dist/*' -exec node --check {} \; && cp -r config controllers middleware models routes services server.js package.json dist/ && mkdir -p dist/resumes && echo 'Build successful - dist folder created'
